This class represents each grid cell in the game

changed(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.SettingsController

checkcondition() - Method in class application.Gridcontroller1
Method which checks which all players have lost till now If all players have lost it stops the game and displays the winner.
checkcondition() - Method in class application.Gridcontroller2

This method is used to handle the event when player clicks the settings button on the mainmenu page.
